definition.text: Kraken is tested for data mining but not for live trading.

paragraphs.text: 1-min OHLCVs Capability: Yes. The ability to fetch historic data for backtesting purposes has been verified.
Trading Capability [**]: Unknown. The ability to run strategies in live-trading mode has not been verified.
Comments: With standard settings only one day worth of Raw Data is fetched. To retrieve Raw Data in Kraken, pairs in config are reversed. Backtesting and Live Trading behaviour unknown
